entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
